## Binomial probability distirbution 

```{r binomial probability distribution}

p= 0.1
N= 100

p_0_N = (1 - p)^N

store = rep(NA, N+1)
store[1]= p_0_N


for (k in 1:N){
  
  p_k_N = ((N-k+1)/k)*(p/(1-p))*store[k]
  store[k+1] = p_k_N
  
}

plot(seq(0:N), store, xlab="k", ylab="p(k)")
```

## The poisson distribution

```{r poisson probability distribution}

r= 0.02
t= 100
cutoff = 0.999
p_k = NA

p_0_t = exp(-r*t)
sum= p_0_t
p_k[1] = p_0_t

i = 1

while (sum < cutoff){
  
  k = i
  p_k_t = ((r*t)/k)*p_k[i]
  p_k[i+1] = p_k_t 
  sum =  p_k_t + p_k[i]
  
  i= i+1
  
}

plot(k, p_k, xlab="k", ylab="p(k)")
```
